item.description:
Real Estate in Your IRA - Yes You Can!

A representative from Equity Trust will show you how to use your self-directed IRAs and 401Ks to invest in real estate.

Imagine your investment returns in a tax free environment. Investing using your self-directed IRAs offers you tax free profits PLUS large tax deductions, asset protection and estate planning benefits.

Learn how self-directed IRAs and 401Ks can put you in the driver's seat toward financial freedom.


Monthly Meeting
6:30 PM, Thursday, Nov. 18, 2010

Best Western, 380 Winter Street, Waltham, MA

free for members; only $25 for nonmembers

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
